comments.body: I agree that this is inevitable because `AvroOptions` lives in external module.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +140,144 @@        (SQLConf.LEGACY_PARQUET_REBASE_MODE_IN_READ.key, ParquetOptions.DATETIME_REBASE_MODE)
      case "Avro" =>
        (SQLConf.LEGACY_AVRO_REBASE_MODE_IN_READ.key, "datetimeRebaseMode")
      case _ => throw new IllegalStateException("unrecognized format " + format)
    }
